channel.title: Who To Add Alerts when people login?
channel.description:
hey mopar. i want to add to my server when a staff member logs in. eg, mod , admin , owner ect... example. " Owner Example Has Logged in.
this would really help and just so you know incase you need to im useing PI base (InsidiaX)

item.title: Who To Add Alerts when people login?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Make a check, if a player with the username you specify logs in do a sendMessage.
Or, if you want the NPC to shout the message (similar to Allstarscape) add in your message within the NPCHandler class.

Read full topic
item.source: Who To Add Alerts when people login?
